pullrequest.title: Add support for copying & pasting nested models in model editor

content.raw:
Copying deeply nested models is not working properly:

1. Open the deeply nested model world: gazebo test/worlds/deeply_nested_model.world

1. Right click the model and edit it, the model's hierarchy shows up on the model tree widget

1. Click on any of the nested models, the top level one gets selected

1. Copy and paste, all the parts seem to be there but the hierarchy does not show on the left panel. Even if you save it and reload into the editor, the hierarchy is not there. Joints between the nested models don't show either.
content.html:
Copying deeply nested models is not working properly:

  1. Open the deeply nested model world: gazebo test/worlds/deeply_nested_model.world

  2. Right click the model and edit it, the model's hierarchy shows up on the model tree widget

  3. Click on any of the nested models, the top level one gets selected

  4. Copy and paste, all the parts seem to be there but the hierarchy does not show on the left panel. Even if you save it and reload into the editor, the hierarchy is not there. Joints between the nested models don't show either.
